item.title: Getting Started with AWS Cloud Security
item.description:
Getting Started with AWS Cloud Security

When building applications on AWS, security should be your top priority. This post covers essential security best practices for AWS environments.

Understanding the Shared Responsibility Model

AWS operates on a shared responsibility model:

  • AWS: Responsible for security OF the cloud (infrastructure, hardware, software, facilities)
  • You: Responsible for security IN the cloud (data, configurations, access management)
